basics.name: Billy Junaidi
basics.label: Application Support Specialist
basics.summary: I am a critical thinker when it comes to new technology, always eager and quick to learn new things. I have gained valuable experience in both fast-paced and secure banking working environments, having worked in this field for more than 5 years. Now, I am continuing my journey in a new business line, specifically in logistics. I pride myself on being able to work with speed and accuracy simultaneously, which allows me to complete tasks efficiently.

work.name: DPDHL ITS Asia Pacific
work.summary: Application Support Specialist for GCDB (Global Customer Database)
responsibilities: Provide support as per user request for GCDB
Troubleshooting error log and server configuration
Colaborate with BUIT and DevOps team to implement new features and fix bugs
achievements: Developing and maintaining GCDB. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.
